titleInfo.title: Introduction: Written texts on the Move. Medieval Manuscript Culture in a Multimedia Environment
Transforming the Medieval World. Uses of Pragmatic Literacy in the Middle Ages

bibliographicCitation.apa: Arlinghaus, F. - J., Ostermann, M., Plessow, O., & Tscherpel, G. (2006). Introduction: Written texts on the Move. Medieval Manuscript Culture in a Multimedia Environment. In F. - J. Arlinghaus, M. Ostermann, O. Plessow, & G. Tscherpel (Eds.), Utrecht Studies in Medieval Literacy: Vol. 6. Transforming the Medieval World. Uses of Pragmatic Literacy in the Middle Ages (pp. 1-15). Turnhout: Brepols.
